name: Cube's adventures
description:
THE GAME:

Cube's adventure is a platformer game where you have to complete levels, overcoming enemies and various obstacles.

How to play:

A - D / Left arrow - right arrow: Left and right

Space bar / Up arrow: Jump

Info:

The game is still under development, so, if you see bugs or you have some ideas to improve it, tell me what you think in the comment section.
